title: Foolproof apple cake
ingredients: ['250g butter or margarine, at room temperature', '2 1/2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '250g caster sugar', '5 eggs', '350g plain flour', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1kg apples - peeled, cored and diced', '90g icing sugar, or as needed', 'hot milk, as needed']
